org.dblp.mmdb.datastructure

Class SimpleLazyCoauthorGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dblp.mmdb.datastructure.AbstractCoauthorGraph
      • org.dblp.mmdb.datastructure.SimpleLazyCoauthorGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DblpInterface
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class SimpleLazyCoauthorGraph
extends AbstractCoauthorGraph
    A simple coauthor graph implementation. This graph is loaded lazy into main memory whenever any local information is queried.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DblpInterface EMTPY_DBLP

    • Field Detail

      • EMTPY_DBLP

        public static final DblpInterface EMTPY_DBLP
        Deprecated. 
        An empty DBLP. Used mainly for testing code without building an actual graph object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleLazyCoauthorGraph

        public SimpleLazyCoauthorGraph(MmdbInterface mmdb)
        Deprecated. 
        Create a new, empty SimpleLazyCoauthorGraph. The local parts of the actual graph are not materialized before any required local information is queried.
        Parameters:
        mmdb - The MMDB.
